transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Haanji sir, namaste, main IndiaMART se call kar raha hun.
Customer: Namaste.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Yes.
Executive: Haanji sir, main IndiaMART se baat kar raha hun sir.
Customer: Yes sir.
Executive: Uh, sir baat kar sakta hun aapse? Free hain abhi?
Customer: Haan sir, free hun.
Executive: Uh, sir ye keh raha tha, sir baat hui thi, toh services ke bihaf mein main aapko guide kar dun sir main?
Customer: Haan sir, bataiye.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan sir, bol sakte ho.
Executive: Main keh raha hun sir ki services ke bihaf pe aapko meeting kar sakta hun sir? Koi time bata sakte hain?
Customer:
Executive: Time.
Customer: Meeting mein kya karna hai, woh batao.
Executive: Sir, meeting mein sir hum aapko services ke bihaf pe guide karenge ki kaise business aap gain kar sakte hain sir IndiaMART se.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Ji. Toh koi time bata sakte hain sir?
Customer: Sir, aadhe ghante mein free ho jaunga.
Executive: Aadhe ghante baad?
Customer: Aadhe ghante mein.
Executive: Main aadhe ghante baad call karun sir aapko?
Customer: Yes sir.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai, theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai sir.
Customer: Papa.
Customer: Papa ji?
Customer: Are you?
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to know the meeting agenda.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to guide on business gains.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call after half an hour.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- services, meeting, business
